resources.string: Please turn on the device volume to perform this demonstration. The alarm doesn\'t fire very exactly. On Android Oreo, you need to activate the dummy foreground service. You also need to add this app to the whitelist to avoid Doze mode.

Please turn on the device volume to perform this demonstration. If you use the job scheduler, you can avoid the background restriction in Android Oreo. But the repeat interval seems to be limited to the interval obtained by JobInfo.getMinPeriodMillis ().

Please turn on the device volume to perform this demonstration. If you use the job dispatcher, you can avoid the background restriction in Android Oreo. Furthermore, there seems to be no limitations of minimum period. However, GooglePlayServices will need to be installed.

Please turn on the device volume to perform this demonstration. If you use the job intent service with alarm manager, you can avoid the background restriction in Android Oreo. Furthermore, there seems to be no limitations of minimum period. But you need to consider separately for Doze mode.

This is a stream test by IPC using parcel file descriptor. Since pipe is used, md5 is used for data identification. Refer to the source code and logcat for the actual operation of the demo. If you want to test a service from another application, you need a copy of the aidl file that defines the IPC behavior. This demo does not include tests from other apps.
